person_say: I'm struggling with my body image. What can I do to accept myself more?
animal_say: I hear you! Body image can be tough. What specific feelings or thoughts are bothering you the most?

person_say: I'm really worried about how others see me, and I often find myself comparing my appearance to others.
animal_say: That’s understandable, and it can be exhausting! Bruno the bear is great at relaxation and self-acceptance. Want to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds wonderful! I would love to learn more about relaxation and self-acceptance from him.
animal_say: Fantastic! Let’s go see Bruno. He'll help you embrace self-acceptance and relaxation. You’ve got this!
